website_summaries.verdict: This higher-watt machine cures your polish in an instant, and the heat dissipation hole design keeps your hands and the unit from overheating.
pros: Detachable base for use with toes
Dries many types of gel and shellac
Heat dissipation hole design cools the machine to prevent overheating
Machine can be started automatically through infrared induction
Light beads last up to 50,000 hours
cons: May take longer than expected for polish to dry
If so, consider running a cotton ball soaked with nail polish remover or rubbing alcohol over the nail like they do at the salon

website_summaries.verdict: A large nail dryer that cures gel nails in a couple of minutes.
pros: Large enough to fit your entire hand
cons: Some customers have complained that it gets hot when longer curing times are used

customer_reviews.title: Great condition, detailed manual, AND free items!
customer_reviews.text: It came in great condition with free protective gloves and two nail filers . The best part is that it came with a very clear user manual that explains in explicit detail how you can apply & cure gel nailpolish properly and even gave tips on what to avoid/not do to ensure a longer lasting manicure. I am excited to give this to my sister for her birthday and see her reaction and comments on its curing abilities.
customer_reviews.author: Fatima

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded to this from a UV nail light, so much faster!
customer_reviews.text: I do my own gel nails (and toenails) at home, I got all the products I needed here on Amazon. This light really speeds up the process and it's not harmful to your eyes which makes me feel better especially when I do my daughters nails. It's definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: MorganTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE! :)
customer_reviews.text: Just got this lamp and I LOVE it! I stopped getting my nails done at the salon years ago because it was getting to expensive. This lamp is salon grade in my opinion and it is so nice how it has a digital timer. I love that it can fit all 5 fingers in and turns on and off by simply placing your hand/ foot in the lamp. I would definitely recommend buying this lamp for anyone looking to purchase one!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Waters

customer_reviews.title: Huge Upgrade from My eBay Purchase in 2009!
customer_reviews.text: I have been meaning to upgrade from my UV 4-bulb set up with only an on and off function for a long time. This LED/UV lamp does everything you need - timers are great but I typically just use the motion sense function and which counts while your hand's in and remove it when I hit my desired time which triggers the light to turn off. I also like that the cord is removable and there are no bulky bulbs - instead they are all built into the lamp making it worry-free for travel. Very sleek looking as well. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: J*Giiirl

customer_reviews.title: Love the lights on the side to get the edge ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the lights on the side to get the edge of my thumb and love the sensor that senses your hand under the light. Very user friendly!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have found nothing to dislike about this dryer yet
customer_reviews.text: Dries all the polishes I've tried so far in 30 seconds. That also includes top coat and foundation. I do give no wipe top coat about 45 seconds. Plenty of room for your whole hand or whole foot. Four timers or you can use the auto-on feature and it will just start to count up for you. Have found nothing to dislike about this dryer yet.
customer_reviews.author: PeachyTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: love this!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter did a gel French manicure this morning and it worked perfectly with this product. It was a little hot around the edges when your fingers are close to lights. But my hand fit in perfectly and it had a time to tell it to stop! Works great! Given to her for a birthday gift and she has only been able to use it a few times but it worked just as said.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Us nail lamp
customer_reviews.text: So happy I got this. Works beautifully. Saves me money and time at the nail salon. Now I can do my own nails at home when I want. I've used this lamp only once so far and I'm very pleased with how well it works.. much better then expected. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Nied

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: This baby is great! And I have not received anything for saying this. I'm new to the gel process at home, so this is my 2nd dryer. It is so much larger than the other one and I really like being able to do my whole hand at once. I'm sure you could do both hands at once if you wanted to. Thanks again for the great product.
customer_reviews.author: JCinWinder

customer_reviews.title: Plan on 2 minutes for each layer...
customer_reviews.text: At first I was disappointed. It takes the full two minutes to cure each layer, base, color, and top coat. My small LED lamp was much quicker 30 sec for base, 2 min for color, and 30 sec for top. I like the size, I have large hands and have no issues with getting my hand in. The instructions are poorly written, but not really needed. Just plug it in and stick your hand in. The bottom also comes off to allow toes under the lights. The unit is attractive and very light weight. The cord is longer than other units which is very nice. After using the lamp twice I find that my nails last longer.
customer_reviews.author: MummQ307

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 most expensive gel machine (opi) $400 each. They discontinued. After 5+years one of it stop working. I've many more brand that's is as expensive $200+...and nothing compare to this one. This is the best thing I've ever bought. I've bought 1 to try out 4days ago, love so I ordered 2 more right away. They just deliver couple hours ago. I'm now thinking if I should buy like 4 more for backup😀🤔 cause it's freakin cheap and work great 👍🏼😀love it & highly recommend it to everyone ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few months now. I like to use it at 60 intervals. One video said do ONE NAIL at a time and let it set with the 10 second mode then on the 5th nail do it for 60 seconds, which I did. This prevents the nail gel from pooling or rippling ....... this happens if you are doing all your nails on one hand at the same time. After all we are not professionals! Lol
customer_reviews.author: cbear

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this nail lamp. You can choose your timer with one click of a button. The motion detection works just fine. I've used this to cure polygel and gel polish. The lights cure at almost all angles so you don't have to worry about the sides of your nails getting missed. It's great. I love it! My only complaint is that mine has a loose piece inside. I think a small plastic bracket must have broken during transit and is jiggling around inside. But it works great and nothing has fallen apart, so it must not have been important.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: and works great and its a good size as well
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today i was excited to use it so i did, and works great and its a good size as well , i love that has the light sensor so as you as you put your hand it turns and off when you take hand out drys the gel off easy too, and the price was deff fair
customer_reviews.author: walky

customer_reviews.title: Great for the salon.
customer_reviews.text: I am a nail technician and I use this in the salon. It's fast and dries pretty much any gel polish. I have used three different brands and all cured perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Nik

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic- works quickly- can do more coats in less time than with other, older models
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I had to replace my Sally Hansen LED nail lamp (died after 5 years). This nail lamp is fantastic and definitely worth the price. With my old lamp, i'd have to keep my nails under the lamp much, much longer than instructed. With this lamp, it really does cure the nails in 30-60 seconds. i'm able to do more coats in less time, and it lasts about 2-3 weeks. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I was looking into quality, yet affordable nail lamps for DIY gel manicures, and this one had the most and highest rated Amazon reviews. Did quite a bit of research and decided to go with this since this was my first time buying a nail lamp. Glad I did and I agree with all the reviews! It is so easy to use right out of the box. Just plug in, choose your time, and the lamp turns on when you place your hand inside. It's very spacious and lightweight. Added bonus was that it came with nail files too. Looking forward to using this frequently! Will update if there are any issues with longevity.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: I love my MiroPure 36W UV LED Nail Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love my MiroPure 36W UV LED Nail Lamp! It's so easy to use. When you set the timer it will start as soon as you put your hand in. Then it counts down and turns off once the time is up. It's made to look very professional and works great with my gel polishes. I keep telling my friends that this lamp is awesome. I will continue doing my own gel manicures thanks to this lamp. Not spending any more money at the salon for my manicure when I can do them at home. Thank you for making such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Can the lamp also disinfect cell phones and other small items that fit inside the unit?
customer_reviews.text: I have used this device for a few years and I love it! I use it during girls night to do mani's on each other. I am aware of the new phone disinfecting light box and most salons use a type of UV to sterilize implements. I am curious to know if i put my cell phone inside, will it disinfect it?
customer_reviews.author: Ruthiehoney

customer_reviews.title: I’m very happy with the acquisition, I recommend it 100% excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I’m fascinated with the MicoPure 2in1 LED/UV Lamp 36W. Bought it off of Amazon for a good price $36.99 plus 5% coupon, regular prices is $49.99. Inside the box comes two nail files, the power cord, two instruction booklets and the lamp. Work fast 30 second with any gel and with the new Gelish Polygel product, the presentation of the products watch in very good condition, the delivery was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Magnolia!

customer_reviews.title: Heats up Well for a Good Strong Bond
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a couple of these lamps as I just started doing gel nails. I guess third time is the charm because this UV/LED gel lamp really heated up well! I think my nails will actually stay on now (I use build up gel & it was popping off with the old lamps within a couple days). It takes a long time to build the nails then file them to the right shape, so having to do it again in a couple days was frustrating. With this lamp getting heated correctly, I don’t think I’m going to have any problems with that! Yay!! A lamp that works!!
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Easy even for a husband!!
customer_reviews.text: I have sometimes done my wife's nails when she was feeling brave. I could do a passable job, but it was never easy. Yesterday, we tried the gel polish and this curing lamp for the first time...and I couldn't be happier with the results!! Not exactly salon quality but that had everything to do with my lack of experience with cuticles. The polish went on flawlessly and being able to cure the nails fully between coats made it so much easier. Also, since the polish doesn't cure outside of the lamp, I had more time to get the polish right without it trying to dry! Love this lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Marc Fitzroy

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good UV LED NAIL LAMP
customer_reviews.text: I just received this MiroPure 36W UV LED Nail Lamp with 4 timer today, i could not wait to use it with my Aimeili temperature color polish, i am not a professional, but i can read and FOLLOW SIMPLE INSTRUCTIONS. This is a very good UV LED NAIL LAMP, I USED THE WHOLELINE OF THE SAM PRODUCT which i believed maximized my results , and followed the instructions, base coat, gel coat , topcoat , drying in between , using thin coats, no it was not sticky in the end , and i used the Aimeili products and it is soo CUTE !!!... I'm happy !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vikki

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic UV LED Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this nail lamp! It’s a perfect size and has small fingerprint inventions so there’s no guesswork about how far in to stick your hand. It’s lightweight, easy to clean and has already saved me $200 in salon costs. I was fortunate to get this setup before we all got quarantined, and I love being able to do my own gels at home. I use bio seaweed gel system and this light works fantastic w it. Any negative reviews may have more to do with the gel system being used, but this lamp works great 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective, DOES NOT DRY!
customer_reviews.text: It does not dry gel nails! I dried my nails for over 5 minutes and still feeling tacky and unfinished. When I tried to issue a return, it says the item is not eligible for a return ... Luckily, Amazon customer service was able to resolve the problem. Highly discourage from buying this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cheap Chinese nail lamp which is not correctly calibrated. Upon using it to cure gel it burned my nails incredibly bad and my hand skin was fiery as well. I’m surprised this company hasn’t gotten sued yet. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn G

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully priced, high functioning product! I’ve had this for 5-6 months now and it still works well with no issues. I love the giant digital counter. It is very roomy and the motion sensor works perfectly, as soon as I put my hand in it turns on and vice versa when I remove it. I use it for my manicures and pedicures with no problem, I love that the bottom is easily removable if needed for my pedicures. It DOES come with UV protective gloves and 2 pink nail files as mentioned. It cures my gel polishes wonderfully every time, will definitely recommend as a gift to yourself or others!
customer_reviews.author: Dayla

customer_reviews.title: This Nail Lamp is EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST nail lamp out! It cures to perfection and I even use it on nail forms. The glow is pretty and nails come out even prettier after being under the lamp. I like that you can choose 10s/30s/60s intervals. Not many lamps offer the 10s...wink!
customer_reviews.author: PAJ

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed- Seller made it right.
customer_reviews.text: Update-I was contracted by the seller and was offered a replacement or refund. I no longer needed the replacement so i received a full refund on my order. Thank you. Initially, I loved this lamp. But after about 5 uses, it no longer cures gel polishes or hard gel. I'm disappointed and would not recommend this lamp. I've been trying to get in contact with this seller and no luck. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Yahaira Poblete

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for about two months. 30 seconds for all the gel polish I use of various brands. 60 seconds for hard gel or builder gel. Works like a dream. Nail beds do not over heat. No problems with thumb curing correctly. I don’t know why anyone would pay more for a nail lamp. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shoozzi

customer_reviews.title: All around 5☆ UV LED Nail Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and it was packaged well. It came in a sealed, cute box that you can use to store it in, if needed. This lamp works perfectly! My 6 year old always has a hard time waiting while her polish dries. This lamp is was a life saver! It was my first time using a lamp EVER! Instructions are clear, making it easy for first time users. I am very impressed all around with this product, especially the price. I will be recommending this MiroPure UV LED Nail lamp to all my friends and family members!
customer_reviews.author: Kashmi

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this lamp because I have already tried several others and have been disappointed but the MicroPure LED Nail Lamp is terrific! It works just as well as the ones at the salon without the $200 price tag! Super easy to use. Looks exactly as pictured. Arrives neatly packed in the box, just connect the cord and plug it in! It also comes with two extra course nail files to easily break down the top of gel polish when ready to remove it. The bottom pops off easily so you can use it with your toes also. Quality product! I'm certain you'll love it as much as I do!
customer_reviews.author: KleverKitty

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like doing my nails at home but I don't like it when they take a while to dry so I was looking for an affordable nail lamp that actually works. This one works well!! It has different timer settings, it's lightweight and easy to use. It also has a detachable base so you can use it for toenails. Overall its a great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jen88

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. The bottom comes off and it makes it easy to stick your foot in to do your toes. I like the large counter at the top. I have purchased 2 of these so far. I have had mine for about a year and I gifted one for Christmas this year. I wouldn’t gift anything, I didn’t think was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cosmetologist
customer_reviews.text: Used this a few times now and absolutely have been loving it. It's super easy to set up, the timers are all easy to use, and it actually has enough light to cover all of my nails. I have not needed to use the low heat mode yet as I don't find it necessary, but it's nice to know I have the option. I find with the Gelish polishes I have been using that the power of this is perfect for 60-70 seconds to cure. Overall very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: RecordsHD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting to get a hybrid LED/UV lamp and am so excited to have one!! I love it! The auto sensor works great, the dim LED light for when using the clear gel so the heat doesn't spike when the nails first enter the lamp is genius!! as well as the timer settings, and the fact that you can put your whole hand in and it also has just a counting timer on it as well. Very happy with this product and the price was excellent!! Much better than competitive pricing and you get the same great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Book

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I've never had gel nails done at a salon because I hate them and it's expensive and this makes doing gel nails at home so easy! It still takes a long time because I go slow to make sure I don't flood my nail beds, but since gel lasts so long it's worth it. The lamp is easy to use and I've had no problems with the lamp not curing anything properly and have no complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: flickagal07

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 2 years ago and still works great
customer_reviews.text: Never had any issues with it and quickly dries every kind of nail polish I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Customer Service personnel really strive to have high customer sanctification-go above and beyond.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Machine works great. It took me awhile to get used to ...
customer_reviews.text: Machine works great. It took me awhile to get used to doing my nails right. Watch YouTube video so you can get the hang of how it’s suppose to be done. Make sure you alcohol your nails to get oils out also file the top of your nail so it’s sticks when you add your first coat. So base coat, polish I’d do 3 coats, and then top coat. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Dritana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lamp especially for beginners
customer_reviews.text: It cures soft gel, hard gel, and embellishment quickly. I love that the bottom tray is detachable so you don’t hit your wet hand in the top of the lamp. It’s easy to slide your whole hand in and it turns on with motion. The lights are really bright. Arrived on perfect condition. With a long set that takes a lot of curing between layers, you can feel the warmth of your hands. Nice size. Great for the price and for beginners. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a couple months now and use it daily. No problems with it and it cures fast!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp for Beginner's!
customer_reviews.text: I'm brand new to using gel nail polish but I love this lamp! Its the perfect size. I never have any drying issues. It does what its suppose to do. I've done my nails and my family's nails multiple times with it already for the past 2 weeks and we've been having a blast! The customer service is also amazing! Very quick to respond and very sincere in helping you.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Howard

customer_reviews.title: Problem with loose connection solved by new device provided by manufacturer  HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but as previously reported, it can only be used if you hold the wire connection in place which does not really work when you are doing your toenails. The connection is unbelievably loose. I have not heard from the manufacturer with a solution. Other than this, which is big, I think it is a help.
customer_reviews.author: anonymus

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I got this in the mail and unfortunately it wasn’t turning on, so I used the QR code provided in the box to help troubleshoot this problem. The customer service was fast, responsive, and easy. They are sending me a new lamp free of charge so I can start doing my nails at home! The other reviews have convinced me that this will work great and I am excited to use it once the replacement comes in. Great customer service, will purchase for them again and recommend to others who are hesitant.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie Jung

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little machine
customer_reviews.text: Great product, modern look. I have been going to the nail salon every two weeks for 5 years. It’s gotten to the point where it feels like a chore. One of my friends recommended that I look into doing my nails myself. I ordered this lamp as part of my home nail kit and it is amazing! The quality is great, and it is very easy to use. Works just as well as the more expensive salon brand machines.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvie d

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, well worth money
customer_reviews.text: I start to do my gel nail myself, the old lamp I have usually take several press to cured my nail which is very time consuming. ... This one, with 60 sec cured time, everything are well done..so glad I bought, it cuts my time more than half which now I can put some design on my nail now.
customer_reviews.author: yypizza

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for me
customer_reviews.text: It works well for the price that it is. If you want high quality nails that last a long time, don’t use this. But if you’re like me and have the time to fix your nails if they chip And start to peel, it’s perfect and will save you money!!
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle W.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good lamp. I’ve had no problem curing the structure gel or any nail polishes because it has both UV and LED lights. It’s lightweight and easy to use for both hands and feet. You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: M. Everson

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is awesome. I love the timer function buttons, they take the guesswork out of curing. I only use it on false nail tips, not my real nails, but it's worked out great and I'm really satisfied with it. I've successfully cured both Gelish and Akzentz UV LED polishes with this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah WTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Great for first time gel nail polish users!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is really great. I'm new to gel nail polish so I was definitely apprehensive at first, but this was such a good buy! Very roomy for your fingers and while I haven't tried my toes yet, you could absolutely fit your foot under the lamp. The multiple settings is a great feature. You have 3 preset times (10s, 30s and 60s) or you can do the gradually increasing intensity. The removable lip is held on my 4 very durable, strong magnets. They're strong enough cause I constantly move the unit by the lid alone, never had the base fall off. Very happy with my purchase with nothing negative to say!
customer_reviews.author: Karin Hurwitz

customer_reviews.title: Professional grade curing lamp at home!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT nail dryer. Packaging was in perfect condition, the contents new and secure. I used this for the first time without any problems. I purchased my own gel nail polish and it worked like a charm! This is professional grade and the perfect "at-home" gel manicure product! I am very pleased with this purchase. It arrived quickly through amazon prime and would completely recommend to anyone looking for a curing lamp for at home manicures.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree Twilley

customer_reviews.title: Works with CND Shellac! Yay!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it on myself yet but I did use it on my daughter’s nails. To be honest, I was skeptical at first. I read mixed reviews on this, especially on shellac nails. I followed the instructions on CND shellac bottles of nail polish instead of the instructions in the pamphlet. It worked wonderfully and I can’t wait to use it on my nails!
customer_reviews.author: 8ar8ara

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for 2 years now. Still works like the day I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great but!
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit and works well for someone now starting off with gel polish!
customer_reviews.author: Sharntelle Mc

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my first nail lamp and I have only had it for a few weeks, but it works great and cures quickly! The motion detection makes it super easy to use if you are doing nails on yourself. I do my nails a lot so the gloves that come with it prevent my hands from getting super dry. They do shed a little so just be sure to not get any fibers in the polish before it cures so you can keep a smooth application.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works well!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first, but this product worked great. This was my first use so wasn't sure what to expect, but my nails turned out great. They're a little sloppy because it was my first time, but with practice they will turn out much better. The polish was still a little sticky after running through the light so I was afraid it wasn't working, but in the end it turned out great & I love the outcome. I will save so much money doing my own nails now & might even share it with my sister & others ;)
customer_reviews.author: missy

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I've been going to nail salons for over 20 years so I decided to try doing it myself.This is truly a product I've made a good investment and will be doing my nails and saving lots of money and I enjoy it👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Nail lamp
customer_reviews.text: Does work with regular nail polish but takes forever to dry your nails. Had to do it on 60 seconds 4 times on my left hand and 4 times plus 30 seconds then 60 again on my right hand so if you don't mind it taking forever to dry your nails can be used on regular nail polish, other wise use Gel nail Polish.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Knox

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This light is fantastic and super easy to use. It is a very high quality at an affordable price. I have done several sets of gel nails at home and saved myself a ton of money. I now use only gel polish.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Just receive the product, Did my moms nails and mines with this lamp and so far so good. This is my first ever attempt to do gel nails. I use gelaze and gelish brand nail polish and both cured under the 99s automatic setting. The only thing i did not like about product is it feela warm to the touch after two uses. Will update if something weird happens.
customer_reviews.author: Moraima Santos Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I only used it once & so far I am impressed with the quality of the product. It seems to be working quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Marianna

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I was so over going to nail salons and ending up with a no chip mani that looks bad and getting cut all over my cuticles. I am telling you one of my best purchases on amazon so dar. This UV light machine is a great one with high quality like a salon machine. It feels and works very great and looks expensive. I used it so far 3 times and first I started by using for each layer 2 min but it doesn’t really need that long only 60 sec is enough. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: good customer service
customer_reviews.text: This was a great lamp for about a year when a bunch of the bulbs burnt out, but customer service was very helpful and offered a refund or a replacement, my choice.
customer_reviews.author: bryanna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gel nail lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this lamp! I have never done my own gel nails at home but it couldn’t be easier. If you’re on the fence, definitely try it! I used Ameli base and top coat, gellen polish and “dried” 60 seconds after each coat. My nails still look perfect a week later and can’t wait to do them again!
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne Wadden

customer_reviews.title: So far so good only used twice, I have my fingers crossed
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Only used it twice. My last one similar to this lasted me only a year and a half and I only do nails on two people every six weeks. So hopefully this one will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: RedPoetryXOTWOD

customer_reviews.title: It’s already paid for itself!
customer_reviews.text: I just used this for the first time, and I’m really happy with it! I’ve had 2 other lamps, but they never completely cured my gel polish. This lamp worked great the first time out of the box. My nails turned out beautifully. It’s already paid for itself!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Giancaspro

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: Save money by doing my own nails in the comfort of my own home when ever I want. I’ve had this lamp over 3 years! Works great even today. Salon results every time. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: It's still working just fine despite those two incidents
customer_reviews.text: Works as described! I have had no issues drying any of the shellac/gel polished I've purchased while using this machine. Have dropped it a couple times - once my fault being careless and once the dog tripped over the cord (oops!). It's still working just fine despite those two incidents. Good size. I can fit my hands and toes in comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfectly with Gelish
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time today. It worked perfectly! I will be honest at first I was nervous as it was tacky in between coats and at the end. As soon as I wiped my nails with alcohol at the end they were perfect! I used all Gelish products. I have been getting my nails done in the salon every 2 weeks for years and I’m so excited to save money and do my own with the same outcome and quality!
customer_reviews.author: Brian P.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I personally love gel nails over everything else, and now I can do it at home and save so much money! This device is very user friendly and it also looks very slick!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Renee Caskey

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.text: Great performance for the value. I have used this lamp at home for several months with no issues. I use the auto timer as well. Compact design is easily stored in a case for easy travel. And I believe there was a discount coupon for this lamp when I made my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LaViva

customer_reviews.title: I love the warmup feature and the price was right!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this light- the warm up feature is so much less painful than my UV light was. My gels are even clearer than they were with the uv light... Plus the time I have saved is also so amazing. I don't like that there isn't a turn off switch I have to unplug it, but I can deal with that. my whole hand fits in base and my nails look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and came on time. It’s a nice convenient size and I can take it anywhere. There’s a 30s setting and 60s, it also automatically starts counting up if you insert your hand. It also has the lights all around so you don’t have to do a separate timer for just the thumb.
customer_reviews.author: Nina M

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product!!! Perfection results!!! Dry fast! Gel nail looks beautiful. And the LED is warm levels is very comfortable. I’m super picky with my nails. But spending $55 for gel nails and pedi plus $25 tips. No more! I can do my own gel nails now. Thanks to this MiroPure nail lamp!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bellabell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I have used this soooo many times since I received this. Long gone are the days of regular nail polish!! Love it. Good quality and fast shipping. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lynn White

customer_reviews.title: Salon Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This was my 1st time buying a UV lamp and after doing some research on different websites and reading a lot of the reviews for this one, I decided to try it. I love it! I like that the bottons near the top (I've read that some are located on the back). I also love the automatic turn on & off. My nails look like I had them done at a Salon.
customer_reviews.author: Ambers0709

customer_reviews.title: I'm saving money...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lamp along with gel polishes and other hoo-ha, and while my pedicures aren't perfect (due to me, not the lamp!), the fact that I broke even cost-wise after about the 3rd pedicure-made me happy to do my own! This lamp works well, for one hand or foot at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I debated on buying this and I am so glad I did!!!! I love it and I have saved so much money on doing my own nails!!!! This is a great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Totally as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I'm super happy with this lamp. I had gotten a "mini" "travel" lamp from the same company I got my actual gel from, and it wouldn't fully cure the gel no matter what I did. Just not powerful enough, I suppose. This MiroPure lamp came highly recommended, and I'm glad I decided to go for it. It fully cures everything I throw at it, and really does do it faster than I've experienced in most nail salons. I feel great being able to do my own acrylics again. The claim that it doesn't cause heat pain/discomfort is also true from my experience so far. I'd recommend this to both DIYers and licensed techs alike!
customer_reviews.author: Serenity White

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I am a neophyte with gel nails, but this lamp works great. Has several time settings and you can literally squeeze in 1 hand and a few extra fingers if needed. Highly recommend for the ease of use and price! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Antonia

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Great Lamp! Decided to start doing my own gel polish at home and I researched a lot of products. This one had great reviews. I love the different timer options and the led screen. If a specific time isn’t selected it will automatically count up. I like that it has motion sensor so that you don’t have to click anything to turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great little light
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can just slip my hand in and the lights go on. Or, I can select a timed setting. The low-heat option is also great as my nails are very thin and sensitive. I love it so much that I've been buying them as gifts for friends!
customer_reviews.author: DSpackman

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think it would be this easy!  No more wasted money at the nail salon!
customer_reviews.text: I'm super excited about this product! I paid the same amount for the items I needed to do my own gel manicure as I would pay in the salon for one gel manicure! I'll be saving so much money! I tried it for the first time 5 days ago and it was super easy, the instructions were very clear and my nails look fantastic! Now I just need to watch a few tutorials on caring for and prepping my cuticles and I'll be set!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can not go wrong with this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This UV/LED lamp has all bells and whistles! When you remove your hand the timer and lamp goes off, comes back on when you reinsert your hand. Large enough for toes is a big plus! The bottom plate has finger divots as a guide to know when to stop so not to mess up your nails. The plate can also be removed to clean. I needed assistance with activating my warranty and customer service was super helpful. I am very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila H.

customer_reviews.title: Best lamp I’ve used so far (out of 5)!
customer_reviews.text: I love the 99s warm feature! Used with gel, gel polish and Happy Gel (hybrid acrylic gel) and everything comes out flawless. The digital timer is nice and if you just want a quick flash cure, insert hand and the timer counts up for you. The unit looks nice and is comfortable to use. I haven’t used long term yet so I can’t speak to longevity but so far, so great! Thanks! (On a side note, I don’t think this actually does work with uv only products but practically all products out there now are uv/led).
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: I'm Impressed!!!
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is perfect!!! I polished my nails with Gellish nail polish and used my new dryer today. M nails turned out salon perfect but without the cost!!! I should have purchased this dryer a year ago. I used the 60 second timer setting to dry my nail after I applied each coat, such as the base coat, gel polish and Top coat. I also lightly buffed mr nails and used No Lift Nails; Nail Primer before applying the base coat. I saw this method on YouTube and it works!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: RodW1

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: I am tired of paying hundreds of dollars a month to get my nails done! As soon as my lamp arrived I filled my gel nails and they came out perfect. The lamp cured the gel polish in 60 seconds and I'm more than satisfied. The lamp is very durable and works so well to be so cheap! I did not expect the lamp to be so sturdy and work so well. I highly recommend this product. I have used other brands and those lamps did not cure gel polish correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Jordan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good but I've only had 1 test run
customer_reviews.text: So far so good but I've only had 1 test run. It cured CND Shellac. 10s base coat 2 min per color app and 2 min top coat. Wipe with isopropyl alcohol. Will update if any negative experiences
customer_reviews.author: EPG

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: This works just as well as the ones at the nail salon. I am not the best artist so I got polish all over my fingers but with practice, I’m sure I’ll get it right. Either way, the polish dried quickly and turned out smooth. Overall satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This is only the second time I’ve used it and it’s wonderful! It’s super easy to use and has directions to follow. I had the same polish on for 12 days and I could have gone longer but I was ready for a different color. No chipping or issues with the polish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t one of the best purchases I’ve ever made! You can save sooo much money and get the same great results with a little practice. The lamp is very easy to use. I was excited to learn that if you put your hand in it had a timer or you can click on of the timers and it will count down and shut off when the time runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent nail lamp! I had another lamp that I had to fight with to turn on every time I put my hand in. I love this lamp! You have the three time options (10s, 30s, 60s) or the option to just put your hand in and let it count up. I love the fact that it has sensors so it automatically starts when you put your hand in.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cochrane

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints so far, it does what it's supposed to do. Never had an issue with something not curing but I've only had it a little over a week. If you're having trouble with burning, make sure you're not using to much product at once-- go in multiple layers. The 99 second low heat option is also really helpful with that
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t even think about it BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: The best love the fast and carrying packaging and the product is working better than salons I usually don’t write reviews but I had to for this product It’s must have .
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: This lamp works great!
customer_reviews.text: Salons are closed due to the pandemic. My natural nails are thin and don’t hold regular polish. They break easily. I wasn’t sure I could pull off doing my own nails with gel polish at home. I read a lot of reviews on different lamps and was worried about finding one that would dry them completely. This lamp was plug and play! My nails dried quickly and they look beautiful. It was so easy and I’m thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Pam C.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BUY THIS. The lights were too strong. At 60 sec after 6 secs my hands started to feel hot. I had to take it out and the 99 sec took long but the biggest problems was they sent it with gloves. Which was a red flag that it can't work with it. It is too hot. It's not built like the salon machine.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Good to start up and learn’
customer_reviews.text: Easy to carry! I like that it’s so new and 360 therefore has UV lights all around for more efficient curing. It’s not heavy but sometimes does burn the finger nails. Has 3 different time settings and is motion detected.
customer_reviews.author: Karol Carballo

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. I chose it because of the reviews it got online. It’s easy to use and works great, I was sold after my first use!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Cute design. Works great. I like it
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Great price. It’s motion detection is very precise. Cures my gel fast and the product itself is very very light and has cute design. I like it. It’s like a professional nail lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

product_meta.title: MiroPure UV LED Gel Nail Lamp Light Dryer, Fast Dry 48w Professional Nail Dryer Curing Lamp with Smart Sensor for Home and Salon
feature_bullets: UV LED Nail Lamp Double Light Source Technology: Comparing with uv light of traditional nail lamps, the light is closer to white light, which ensures the color of nail gel and does no harm to your eyes besides protects your skin from being black.

4 Timer Settings& Removable Magnetic Reflective Panel: 10s, 30s, 60s and 99s (Power enhances gradually resolving all pain problems caused by curing gels )The panel can be separated without tools, more convenient for toenail gel curing.

Auto Sensing by Infrared Induction: Hands in, lamp on. Hands out, lamp off. It starts automatically by infrared induction. If you put hand into the machine without pressing time setting button, It will come into the 99s low heat mode.
Revolutionary time memory function: For example, Set the time of the machine at 60s, put the hand into the nail lamp on the second time, it will work automatically and the time countdown from 60s.

Long Lasting LED Lights Beads & Extra Bonus: 33 durable LED light beads with a life span of 50000 hours nonstop, lasting up to 5 years of continuous use. No need to worry about the replacement of the light beads.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
